description: Growing plant seeds, flower seeds, veg seeds, fruit seeds is easy, we need to prepare a soil mixed with manure, after frost (2-3days time) we can sow seeds in that soil, cover the seeds with soil, make sure that small seeds we need to open in hand, and cover gently like for all flowers, and for veg if seeds are big we can sow them in rows, spacing between them should be 3-4 inch a part later few varities needs to be transplanted, always pour less water, remove extra weeds for good growth of the plant
